name: Stories In Stone
description: An RPG about a tribe exploring an ancient world. Forge a bond with your wolf and help your tribe survive! You must settle in a new land, so collect resources, train with your master, and grow stronger by learning powerful skills!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
